Package be.ac.umons.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutomaticController.EndLevelListener
    Must be implemented to be informed of the end of the level
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutomaticController
    Controller used in the Demonstration Mode
    BasicGameController
    Controller used by the LevelChecker extension
    Controller<T extends Game>
    Class used to handle interaction with the user.
    EditorController<T extends Editor>
    Controller used in the Editor
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AutomaticController.Mode
    Manual mode let the user browse solution Automatic mode browse the solutions automatically
